title: How as a pastor Jordan Peterson changed how I read the Bible
description:
Commentary on Jordan Peterson's Biblical Series 2b1: Genesis and Chaos. https://youtu.be/hdrLQ7DpiWs 

This is the first of three on Peterson and Chaos. 
The second video compares JBP's take on Chaos in the precosmic world with that of John Walton. https://youtu.be/uDV7SFhXt4s 

I refer to the Joe Rogan Experience episode with JBP and Bret Weinstein. https://youtu.be/6G59zsjM2UI 

Other links: Louis Berkhof Systematic Theology https://www.amazon.com/Systematic-Theology-Louis-Berkhof-ebook/dp/B01BKSLBOY 

Brevard Childs https://www.amazon.com/Introduction-Old-Testament-as-Scripture/dp/0800605322/ 

John Walton Lost World of Genesis One: https://www.amazon.com/Lost-World-Genesis-One-Cosmology-ebook/dp/B003VM8QK0 

Art of Biblical Narrative https://www.amazon.com/Art-Biblical-Narrative-Publisher-Basic/dp/B004U7L51C 

Mimesis https://www.amazon.com/Mimesis-Representation-Literature-Princeton-Classics-ebook/dp/B00F8MIIKE 

Roland Allen https://www.amazon.com/Missionary-Methods-St-Pauls-Ours-ebook/dp/B006DJYL7U   https://www.amazon.com/compulsion-spirit-Roland-Allen-reader/dp/0802812619 

Jesus Creed http://www.patheos.com/blogs/jesuscreed/ 
RJS https://musingsonscience.wordpress.com/ 
Biologos at biologos.org

Francis Collins the Language of God https://www.amazon.com/Language-God-Scientist-Presents-Evidence-ebook/dp/B000NY12E6
